website_summaries.verdict: Yes, it's snail slime, and yes, it's incredibly effective at hydrating your skin. Snail secretion filtrate has been hugely popular in Asia for years, but American beauties have finally caught on to its skin-soothing benefits as well. Pack of 10.
pros: Along with a nourishing dose of snail secretions, (don't worry, there is no smell) the mask is packed with natural herbs, oils, and vitamins to restore your skin's vitality and texture
cons: None to speak of, other than a slightly slimy texture

customer_reviews.title: ... to add to your neck and chest which is nice if you are bosomy and get unsightly cleavage wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: Generous amount of goo to add to your neck and chest which is nice if you are bosomy and get unsightly cleavage wrinkles. It is important to note that these masks are most effective when only kept on for 20 minutes or so. If they start drying out on your face, they are sucking the moisture away from your skin. Your skin should feel a tad "slimy" when you remove the mask. Just rub that in and you'll be good to go!
customer_reviews.author: M. Otter

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up for the snail!
customer_reviews.text: This mask cleared up years of acne scarring, leaving me with soft, bright beautiful skin, only after about half of the masks in this set. It also reduced the amount of acne I had over all- from a bunch of new acne each day to virtually done. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty free and HG Status
customer_reviews.text: HG- Holy Grail Skin Care product for me. These are one of the few sheet masks that I can fully recommend as more than a fun relaxation/pampering activity. Your face will be rejuvenated and if you are prone to very dry skin you'll see a hydration boost that lasts for a few days. One of the few skincare items I will continue to repurchase any time I run out of. 100% recommend. Of note for those concerned on the cruelty aspect- see the Product Q&A section for how snail filtrate is obtained, no snails are killed- it is cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: JJD

customer_reviews.title: This product works amazingly!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing!!! I’ve tried several different types of masks, but not the snail jelly so I thought let’s give it a shot. I actually had to get a CPAP macine the same week with a full mouth and nose piece. Well it left me with a patch of dried gnarly skin. Two days of using these masks and it is completely gone. My skin is glowing and smooth. The texture of the mask is a little slimy, but I like that because to me and it means the mask won’t dry out in 20 minutes. I have had so many compliments and I quit wearing foundation and concelears. I would recommend this to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these masks!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these snail masks! They make your skin feel so hydrated and soft. Literally fine lines disappear! I already bought these to my daughter as well and she loves them !
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: I've used snail moisturizer bought from Vietnam/Korea from a friend and the results were amazing. Hence the reason why I sought to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: I had serious breakouts after my first and final use. I've used snail moisturizer bought from Vietnam/Korea from a friend and the results were amazing. Hence the reason why I sought to buy this product. .Im an African American female
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Leaves my skin super hydrated when I removed it. just the mask I was looking for, easy and with tons of products. Have super sensitive eyes and this product, doesn't bother me at all.. beyond happy~
customer_reviews.author: GLoria Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Not recommended for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very severe reaction to this facial mask! My whole face was covered with massive hives and blisters. I looked like a freak for a week! I actually used collagen masks from another company made from cucumbers and aloe to help with the burning and itching. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning- contains fragrance despite above product description
customer_reviews.text: Warning - Despite the fact that the amazon product description appears to include the full ingredient list, the ingredients listed on the box includes fragrance! Unfortunately another example of the fact that you can’t trust the information on Amazon even when it appears to be transparent and complete. I feel tricked.
customer_reviews.author: minva

customer_reviews.title: Created irritation, especially under eyes
customer_reviews.text: Product made my skin break out in a weird rash, especially in sensitive areas like around the eyes. It’s very slimy, to the point of being uncomfortable. I would definitely not recommend for even slightly sensitive skin - it’s rare that something has such an effect on my face, I’m not overly sensitive, just fair-skinned.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating and cleaning PLUS mask stays on my face
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered this product. I originally got it because my daughter loves Skederm's snail serum. I ordered a second set of these masks because she discovered my 'cache' when she was home visiting. These masks cause my skin to look and feel more youthful. The snail serum is like a miracle lotion. It helps heal skin and it is very hydrating. These masks also fit much better than others I have tried and they actually stay on my face so I don't have to lay down or recline.
customer_reviews.author: D37

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are exaggerated. It’s just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and bought this product to try on. Very disappointed! The product itself is ok but most of the reviews are exaggerated. i will not buy again. I rather use Beauty diary masks than this, which I have been using for over 10 years and still use it today.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedyCat

customer_reviews.title: Loved these masks
customer_reviews.text: Loved these masks! So worth the money! Left me with healthier glowing skin the next morning. Definitely purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very hydrating!
customer_reviews.text: I've used a slew of many different masks, but found the Korean brands are the best in terms of quality and hydration. This particular brand, SKEDERM Snail Jelly Face Mask, is by far the best I've tried. I will keep purchasing it as it does what I expect it to do! You won't be disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Great moisture mask
customer_reviews.text: Very hydrating. I live in Wyoming a dry no moisture state. Needless to say my skin lacks moisture and needs a ton of help. These masks have provided that moisture without a sticky/tacky residue left after wearing it. I am still looking for a go to acne sheet mask but for moisture this is one of the top I have used so far on my Korean skin journey. Plus when the 20/30 minutes are up the mask still has plenty of juice left but you don’t have it falling off your face, or dripping down your neck. I have used four of these masks for reference and haven’t noticed an overall change in my skin other than the hydration.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: excellent face masks
customer_reviews.text: initially the thought of applying snail excretions on my face was very off putting, but these masks worked very well for me. my face was noticeably brighter after using.
customer_reviews.author: Y.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about trying these. I’m so happy I did! They make such a difference compared to most masks. Not only do they leave my skin feelng soft, they truly do hydrate the skin to the point my fine lines nearly disappear. I’m a lifelong smile through the day person so I have noticible smile lines too. I’m fine with them but I’m also fine with how the mask leaves them less obvious too.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to try this because I have very dry skin that nothing seems to fix. This stuff, however, is amazing. On top of helping my dry skin, these masks make my pores look smaller and my wrinkles less noticeable. And they just overall improve the look and feel of my skin, it’s hard to describe. I honestly didn’t expect putting on a sheet mask for 20 minutes to do more than some professional facials I’ve had but here I am. I’ve tried a lot of sheet masks and these are my favorites without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No differenc
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because a fashin designer kept talking about them non-stop and people who bought them based on his recommendations did talk good about them! I was so excited when I got my package, cleansed my face well before using them, put them on and relaxed for 15 minutes. Other than the gooeyness, I started noticing an itch in my throat. Second and third time, same thing! I figured there might be something I am allergic to. I also didn't notice any difference tone or texture wise, other than hydrating my skin. Every person is different, every skin is different, yours might like it and react well to it, but mine did not!
customer_reviews.author: Hala

customer_reviews.title: Instant Moisturizing/Plumping
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I've tried the snail masks and I am absolutely mind blown by how plump and moisturized my skin feels. I live in Colorado so the elevation and dry climate is murder on my skin. I own a fortune in moisturizers, serums, masks, etc. This snail mask made an INSTANT difference and I didn't even need to use a moisturizer for 24 hours! Buying more asap!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: ... about these masks as most I've tried have been nice but the feeling didn't last once the mask was ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about these masks as most I've tried have been nice but the feeling didn't last once the mask was off. I got a bad sunburn and my face and nose had a couple places that were peeling. No matter how much I exfoliated and moisturized it still looked terrible. After finally getting this slippery thing unfolded and on my face for 15 minutes, all the peeling parts were invisible. 3 days later, it's just barely starting to come back but I have 9 left!
customer_reviews.author: slash

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I do not like this product as much as SkinFood’s mask. The mask is sloppy and hard to handle.
customer_reviews.author: barbara garcia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent mask.... but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this mask didn't really live up to the hype for me. I have moderately dry skin with some breakout zones (combination skin?) and my face usually loves moisturizing products. But this mask felt so heavy and sticky that I had no choice but to wash the serum off my face right afterwards. I didn't see a huge difference in softness or glowy-ness. Pros: there was no strong scent, the packaging was professional, the masks were what they claimed to be, they didn't irritate my skin. Cons: masks just didn't do great things for my skin in particular and left my skin feeling sticky instead of refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super hydrating
customer_reviews.text: This snail mask hydrates like crazy. I get compliments the day after I use it that have such a glow and my skin even has acne scars. Best to use at night so it can hydrate all night and it’s almost like I don’t want to use make up the next day because it’s still so hydrating. I have really dry skin otherwise because my facial cleanser is very acidic and dries it out. Gonna buy it again even though at first it kinda grossed me out that it was made by snails. But so worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is a very slimy product but it does wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I use this a couple of times a week it really makes your face feel smooth and refreshed. The jelly face mask is large enough to cover your entire face. I end up cutting it around my eyes so that it fits on the sides of my nose. First clean your face and then leave it on for 20 minutes. When you take it off there is residue from the snails. I just massage it in to my face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Mary MAGAZINE

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective and pore-clogging
customer_reviews.text: Made no discernible difference in my skin texture, but did cause me to breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to unfold and place on face
customer_reviews.text: This mask provides no more benefits than most other moisturizing masks, but it definitely has a feature that is a total deal breaker for me. It is practically impossible to get the thing unfolded without its becoming completely misshapen and actually kind of shredded. It would end up not covering parts of my face, especially around the mouth, nose, and eyes, which are pretty much the important parts. There is no odor, and the moisturizing is ok. But the difficulty of use makes it much less pleasant to use and also makes it less effective, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kokopelli

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. For reference, I have oily, sensitive, acne prone skin. This mask is loaded with essence, fits well, stays on well and leaves my skin super super soft and hydrated. After I mask, I use what is left one the mask on my neck, arms and legs and those are even super soft the next day. My skin does not react to this product and I love the results. I get complements the next day after this mask. I mask for 20 min after cleansing and toning according to directions and tap the excess in after I take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Felt good while on but didnt like 1-2 days after
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good timing. Used 2x and slight breakout both times but i have super sensitive but not usually problamatic skin and only use medical grade products so unfortunately for me scared to try again. I
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Use habitually for 5 days!
customer_reviews.text: I am going to preface this review with, I have VERY sensitive skin. I have spent hundreds of dollars on myriad products, to no avail. Initially, the product made me break out, it was pulling out all the toxins in my skin. It is day four now and every morning I see dramatic results. My blemishes have disappeared along with my flaky skin. I would recommend this product to anyone who has temperamental skin. Pro tip: if your skin tends to run on the drier side, make sure to actively moisturize throughout the day! This mask is magic and my skin has never looked better.
customer_reviews.author: C. Villa

customer_reviews.title: Leaves you glowing
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously amazing! I live in very dry climate (denver) and these leave my skin incredibly hydrated. I can visibly notice a difference right after I take the mask off. My skin looks refreshed and glows. The serum is still on there the next morning too. I suffer from acne and sensitive skin and these cause no irritation. Addicted. Use them twice a week
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Just try it I promise u would like it!
customer_reviews.text: I give this a five stars! My mom told me to order some snail mask n stuff n I was like what is that for n I was kinda curious about it so I ordered this n I just got mine yesterday n I tried it in the night for 15min it my skin looks so good I’m like does type of picky girls on beauty products n honestly from the first time I see a different!
customer_reviews.author: Arleth gonzale

customer_reviews.title: Helping my post Retin A dryness very well
customer_reviews.text: LOL, I am actually wearing one of these masks right now! If you are looking for moisture you can't go wrong, will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for oily skin, not very heavy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for use while on Accutane, and feel like it wasn't necessarily the most amazingly hydrating mask, but I liked that it was very neutral on my skin-no stinging or burning, and the smell of it wasn't very strong. It would be a great deeper moisturizer for someone with oily skin to use after an exfoliating treatment, because it's not oily. So, if you're obsessed and must do Korean skincare, might as well do this sheet mask.
customer_reviews.author: Mewsby

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use A LOT of different types of facials for my skin. I'm always looking for the magical cure. This one is great! Makes me have a nice glow after. I feel tight after I use it. Closes my pores and cures my redness. LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Decker

customer_reviews.title: Price keeps raising up:(
customer_reviews.text: This product is good but they keep raising up the prices every time I ordered . Can’t keep up with it if I use as often as the instruction 3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these masks!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little grossed out thinking about snail slime on my face but after using one, I have to say this product is one of the best sheets masks that I've used. I will usually use one after using my micro needle roller and after 25-30 min of snail jelly, the light stinging from the micro needle is completely gone. Also this is moisturizing enough that there's no need for facial cream after derma rolling which is not suggested anyway, so this takes care of that! I will definitely buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: soothing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these masks to put on my face after derma rolling. I have been derma rolling for over an year to help clear acne scars on my face and I am always red after and have stinging. I found these browsing one day and applied after derma rolling and I had no stinging or redness, it is very soothing and the smell is not over powering. I save the packet also and use the left over gel in the bag to put on my face the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sheet Mask I've ever found
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself somewhat of a sheet mask expert and I'm very picky about what I like. This is the best one I've ever tried- no matter the price! It is very moisturizing and feels like silk on my skin. I love this especially in the winter time when my skin is very dry and flakey at the end of the day and in the morning. These sheet masks really help. I use them 1-2x per week and will be reordering once I'm out.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing and easy to work into your morning routine
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Leave it on for 15 minutes and then just rub in whats left--feels like a serum that gets absorbed quickly. Then I put regular lotion on top.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: They are refreshing and feel great. However my bf and I broke out like ...
customer_reviews.text: They are refreshing and feel great. However my bf and I broke out like crazy, could've been a coincidence but we normally have pretty nice skin so we're thinking it was the mask. If you have somewhat acne prone skin you might want to avoid these we're not gonna use them again.
customer_reviews.author: gatonegro

customer_reviews.title: petit escargot
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I love all these snail products. These hydrogel coated facial sheet masks just feed the skin, plumps it up and softensit and for myself helps reduce small acne scars. Very generous amount of product, enough to smooth over neck and upper chest. I don't rinse it off. Sheet mask is a little tricky to open.
customer_reviews.author: poesie

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This mask is ridiculously moisturizing. I've never seen a product work so well and it's been great for my combination, breakout-prone skin! Doesn't clog my pores at all while helping with all my dry spots! I put it on before bedtime because it leaves kind of a film. I am hooked on this product.
customer_reviews.author: V-K

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a weird feel to it, it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a weird feel to it, it is a gel, and make sure you wet your skin first (with toner or essence) otherwise the essence doesn't absorb well.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was less sticky
customer_reviews.text: For snail slime the scent is nice and refreshing but the face mask itself, regarding the size, it is too small so I have to stretch out the cutouts to fit my face which ruins it. But I use the extra slime in the bag to cover the places where it does not fit. After I let the mask dry I take it off and try to rub the rest in but it is kind of sticky and sometimes it leaves behind a white residue on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mask to wear before any important event - I usually exfoliate the skin, then wear the mask for 15 minutes, rinse and apply moisturizer and sunblock. The mask gives a very smooth and silky appearance to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Love the results! I wish more came with the pack...
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it love it!!! I love the scent and has a nice cooling effect when you use it. Leaves my face moisturize for hours after use and you can see the difference when you used it. I noticed after the 1st time the instant shine and glow before I went to bed and when I woke up my face looked so refresh and was still glowing!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie 2x4

customer_reviews.title: If you have dry skin, this is a GODSEND
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry skin. Like...flaky, cracked, itchy skin. I also live in a very dry climate. Adding these masks into my skincare routine once or twice a week has been a game changer. Snail is great your skin in general, but these specific sheet masks are my absolute favorites. If you’ve got issues with dry skin, buy these. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe M.

customer_reviews.title: There’s tons of extra liquid in the packets.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t wear makeup often but when I do it tends to dry out my skin. So I open one of the packets a tiny bit and squeeze a bit out and use it as a moisturizer before doing my make up and then when I wash my face later I use it and my skin is nice and hydrated for a couple days without breaking out. Usually my skin is really dry right now because of winter and it’s been tough finding a moisturizer that doesn’t make me break out.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Glow!!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product! I’m very honest with my reviews, and I will say, this face mask definitely leaves your face bright and moisturized! My boyfriend always compliments my “glow” the following morning. I will purchase more. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mickie

customer_reviews.title: This some great goop
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the most moisturizing mask I've ever tried. It's nice and cool to the touch and softens the skin like nothing else I've used. Only thing to get over, is that these are really sticky and you need to be careful unfolding the mask. Other than that, its perfect. Easily my favorite mask as someone with oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great product - but jelly residuals
customer_reviews.text: I really like it and am willing to buy this again because my facial skin is toooo sensitive so that most mask packs make troubles, but not this one. However, there is one issue in this product - after I took off the mask pack, I realized that some particles left on my face. They seemed like jelly things. I understand that this mask pack might be slimy, but I wish they fix the residual issues. It makes me feel uncomfortable and wash my face after applying the mask pack. But still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: best snail mask I have tried!! I have tried several different brands and so far this is my favorite. I highly recommend this product if you care about your skin. My skin is sensitive and the mask does not burn or make my face red. It feels so hydrated after.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: A must-have!
customer_reviews.text: I love these masks. I was skeptical of the generic logo art, but they are really good! They're super saturated and stay on my face pretty well. The masks are made from the material I like that it semi-transparent and not cotton. They have the small slits to help fit your face and are very moisturizing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good except for a breakout
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had time to use 2 masks. They aren’t difficult to put on, dry in about 30 minutes in low-humidity Denver, and leave my face pretty soft and smooth. Unfortunately, they may have triggered an acne outbreak, though. I’m pretty sensitive to all kinds of creams and treatments, so this is not a guaranteed outcome for you.
customer_reviews.author: Twigs In Omaha

customer_reviews.title: Great for plumping the skin
customer_reviews.text: I am a big, sheet mask fan and these have a permanent place in my rotation. The mask is super moisturizing and plumping. They great to use right before the rest of my minimal, skincare routine and my makeup application.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Will get again!
customer_reviews.text: I've recently gotten addicted to Korean type of face masks and these are one of my favorites! They smell great and make my skin feel super soft afterward. I didn't get bad pilling, but it does have a different texture than other masks. The ingredients are great, no alcohol denat. in the ones I got.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and face mask too big to
customer_reviews.text: Eager to try a snail facial product. I ordered this one because I had seen it was one of the best. Tried it as soon as I received it and a few things I wasn’t impressed with. First the mask is way to big for my face and it kept on sliding. Also after I removed it and the moisturizing serum left a sticky feel on my face and I really didn’t like that. It wasn’t a smooth or clean feel to it.. needless to say I don’t care to use it again
customer_reviews.author: Dixie B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to calm and heal irritated skin.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect masks to calm irritated skin. I use a strong Retinol and some days/ nights my skin gets angry..... these masks really heal irritated skin!
customer_reviews.author: Aura

customer_reviews.title: Feels good. Causes zits.
customer_reviews.text: The mask goes on well and feels good. My skin is nice afterward. However, whenever I put one on, I get unhappy inflamed-red pimples almost immediately, and some pronounced blackheads. It takes 3-4 days for them to go away.
customer_reviews.author: EOLS

customer_reviews.title: BEST SNAIL JELLY MASK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Medical Esthetician for 23 yrs now working for Dermatology and plastic surgery ctr. ,,this snail jelly mask is by far my absolute favorite!!! I use it once a week religiously...its my staple for luminosity, hydration , smoothness and firmness. I recommend this mask to all my patients .. safe to use post procedure ie; microdermabrasion, diamond tip exfoliation, dermaplane or light chemical peel. :)
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: The slime is sublime, at this time.
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of weeks before I decided to buy this mask in my cart. I’ve only tried it once so far but I’m impressed that it hasn’t caused a breakout, it was oozing with serum, and it didn’t feel cheap. It was moisturizing for sure, and my face felt pretty soft after. If I change my mind about it’s performance, I’ll be back.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: so moisterizing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mask type for 2 years and I have purchased it to too many times to name. I love how it makes my skin feel and I use it regularly, especially when I travel to curtail acne and dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing and cooling mask. I'm always afraid of waking up the next morning with a rash from using a new product, but nothing but smooth hydrated skin from the Sanil Jelly Mask. After I used it on my face, I placed it on my neck and decollete, plenty of liquid still on the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Long Tall Texan

customer_reviews.title: Soft skin and no breakouts
customer_reviews.text: Only sheet masks that haven't broken me out. Everything breaks me out but this has really good and safe ingredients in it and my face is always amazingly soft. Will continue buying these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Not as good as expected. See no difference in my face.
customer_reviews.author: Jc

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time/money
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t seem to do anything for my face. Felt like a waste of time/money.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen A.

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I would of liked this product more if it wasn’t a mask and was just a gel you put on your face and washed off. But for being a mask, it is really good. It makes my skin feel soft and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Magical Moisturizing Mask
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face mask! I put this bad boy on for about 25 minutes and then peel it off and rub in the excess into my face. I feel like my face looks better and more youthful every time I use it. It’s amazing! To me, the smell is pleasant and not strong and the mask has an amazing ability to clear up dry spots on my face unlike any other product I’ve tried. It is also very affordable. I would 100% recommend this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Life changing product
customer_reviews.text: Holy Cow, this face mask did not disappoint. I have used the masks 3 times in 2 weeks and the results are amazing. My skin looks so glowy and dewy. I will continue to incorporate the face masks into my skin regime and will definitely be re-ordering as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I've tried several wishtrend/k-beauty products from toners, serums, to night creams, but this is the only product I see immediate, noticeable results from. Plus, no breakouts! Even though I am acne prone..
customer_reviews.author: Kara Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Def see difference. I take mask while still in sealed foil and soak package in heated water for several minutes. Mask is such warm and comforting used this way. I notice reduction in scarring visibility. Scars are way less noticeable . Have purchased twice
customer_reviews.author: lisa murray

customer_reviews.title: Very hydrating - makes your skin glow
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through this whole box now, I actually really like these masks. I am currently on a round of Accutane and my skin is drier than anything you could even imagine. I've had sheet masks in my routine, but if you've ever been on this medicine, you'll know that almost nothing helps. These masks actually have hydrated my skin which has been great considering. I'll definitely have these as my go to masks from now on even after I can stop the medicine.
customer_reviews.author: krysten

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if you have dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product!! Moisturizes my skin and sometimes in the mornings there will still be some product left on my face. When I was in middle school I dealt with oily skin that breaks me out so I use a face wash and a toner that drys my skins out to help with break outs but now my skin is flaky. I use this mask once a week and it keeps it from being oily or flaky. Perfect medium. It also helps with my acne scars!
customer_reviews.author: allison lenon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Real deal, I tried several (even more expensive) face masks before but nothing is as moisturizing and brightening as this. Value and Price point, it’s in the lower point of what’s in the market and the quality is amazing. I didn’t need to put moisturizer because there were a lot of residues left. I also suggest using this at night. Definitely worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Lei Yandoc

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like the masks. They have a lot of essence so you can moisturize your neck, chest, and arms in addition to wearing the mask. They make my skin feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very slimy,true to the snail name. It took while to dry up on my face but it dies leave your face moisturized. But after you take it off it's some white glue like residue that stays on your face.
customer_reviews.author: shell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I have used. I generally don't have issues with my face, but I break out a lot under stress and when in the sun. This snail masks instantly helps get ridnof these buttons. It's like magic for me.and it's super moisturizing and you wake up with a glowy completion if you use it the night before.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Snail Mask
customer_reviews.text: I've got combo/dehydrated skin. This acts as a heavy serum for me. I use this on days when my face needs a little extra love because I've over exfoliated or used too many actives. Will buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Cook

customer_reviews.title: contains fragrance
customer_reviews.text: these masks are awesome, so soothing and loaded with snail goodness. knocked a point off because these totally do contain fragrance even though the ingredients listed here don't mention it. it's not a potent fragrance though and it didn't irritate my already sensitive skin, but the INCI should be updated to reflect the current packaging.
customer_reviews.author: megan h

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These masks are exactly what I was looking for. Slimy (as expected) but the end result is incredible. I wake up the next morning and my skin is perfectly dewy.
customer_reviews.author: BCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this mask does magic on my face, it brightens and softens my skin, I prefer this mask over expensive luxury products. During the winter my skin gets dry and dull so this year I used this mask every other day and my skin is better than ever. I highly recommend everyone to try. I personally reorder the 20 pack all the time and cant get enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super hydrating.
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this mask. It is really gooey, there’s a lot of snail gel to it. I bought the package for a friend and tried one of the masks last night. Love it and will order again
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: This mask is super moisturizing and no smell
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they mentioned using a facial toner first; trust me, you don't need it. This mask is super moisturizing and no smell. I used the first 1 sheet three times( refrigerate it after each use). I am extremely happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Womack

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and tried the product. So far satisfied with how my skin feels right after. Definitely brightens my face and makes skin feel soft and elastic. Also has a cooling and hence calming effect.
customer_reviews.author: OneRoopee

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description (Just a Regular Ole Sheet Mask)
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice mask, but it is just a sheet mask 😕 The description makes it sound like the mask is hydrogel or cellulose, but it is just a regular ole slippery sheet. Womp womp. I only have myself to blame for not being more thorough in my research of the product, but I cannot help but feel disappointed. You tricked me “Jelly” 🥺 Thanks for the stocking stuffers?
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great mask and I am a mask JUNKIE!!!! I have tried so many masks, but this one really works for me. It fits well and is very hydrating after only 15-20 minutes. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: jdefranc

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Product is very easy to open and apply. I've used other snail facial products before but bought this for the deal of a price. Very very little snail jelly in their formula. You get what you pay for. This left a very sticky residue.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Lay

customer_reviews.title: Would use this product 1,000X times.
customer_reviews.text: Good for Sensitive skin. Amazing moisturizer. Would recommend and but again 100 times:
customer_reviews.author: katie cowsar

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is a skincare staple and has been for over a year now. These face masks are so good they put name brand ones to shame. Especially when you consider the price and quantity. Forget about your sheet mask sephora order and just get these.
customer_reviews.author: H.C.

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell they work
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan... They are extremely slimy and hard to apply. I can't tell they make any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Reader

customer_reviews.title: I like this mask
customer_reviews.text: I use this mask for 3 times a week, it gives enough moisture for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Zaya

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask it feels so good. I rubbed it on my neck as well when I took it off my face. It smells good, and feels good. It left my skin feeling so smooth and soft. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: My go to Sheet mask
customer_reviews.text: I use a sheet mask at least three times per week. These are my 'go to'. I love how moisturizing they are and the smell is great. My skin feels great after. I think I've purchased three 10 packs of these now and will continue to do so. I rotate these with others, but these are my fav...
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Harper

customer_reviews.title: Really like the product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have seen a bit of a difference in my skin. I heard that Korean skincare is one of the top leading skin cares. At first I was a little turned off by the idea of putting snail on my face but I actually have to say I have grown to like it.
customer_reviews.author: SHANA OGNIBENE

customer_reviews.title: I hate this product
customer_reviews.text: I hate this product. I'm so disappointed I bought it. It clogged my pores even more and I broke out like crazy after 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love these masks! Experiencing great results so far, can’t wait to see how it looks after two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I have the driest of driest skin and most Face Sheets have a feeling of wet and not moisturizing; these as soon as you remove from the bag you can tell the difference. They are amazing. I will take a before/after photo after next treatment! I recommend for any age!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnie

customer_reviews.title: You can never go wrong it this!
customer_reviews.text: I really love Snail Jelly Facemask this is my first time using them, I had been using the natural mask sheets all the time upon hearing about snail secretion filtrate power I decided to give it a try and it totally worth it. I follow a routine with cleanse - clay mask - serum - snail facemask
customer_reviews.author: Austin Vo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Not really a scent, makes my skin feel nice and soft. No visible changes yet however it's only the first week
customer_reviews.author: Michele Montalto

product_meta.title: SKEDERM Snail Jelly Face Mask Sheet with Snail Secretion Filtrate 5,000ppm for Deep Moisturizing, Pack of 10
feature_bullets: [SNAIL SECRETION] 5,000ppm Snail Secretion Filtrate(SSF) captured in Hydrogel coated Premium Sheet
[KEY BENEFITS] 1. Anti-agening 2. Skin repair 3. Radiance 4. Moisturizing effect on your face.
[CLINICALLY PROVEN] Regenerative ingredients are designed for ultimate absorption and hydration.
[EASY APPLICATION] Serum-enriched Hydrogel provides perfect adhesion to your skin, result in deep hydration.
[CRUELTY FREE] No snails are harmed or stressed during filtrate collection.
